bookSourceComment:
此书源可以开箱即用，无需进行其他操作
但由于此书源API来自于番茄Web共享API服务项目，API来自于共享地址，而共享地址目前仅来自一台云手机
因此，如果你有能力搭建番茄web服务，请尽量自己搭建后共享（如果所有人都选择白嫖而不去搭建，那么所有人都将无法使用此API/书源）
此书源使用Xposed模块番茄Web 搭建
番茄Web地址：因版权原因，请自行搜索
模块下载：自行使用action
书源：Wodlie
项目经过了一些代理节点，会有点慢（云手机→frps云服务器→cloudflare→你）
感谢 移动云手机 freefrp.net https://github.com/AceDroidX/frp-Android 提供部分软件支持
目前免费线路会时不时断线，如果你有经济可以赞助我：
https://ifdian.net/a/Wodlie

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  let defaultVariable = {
    "volume": {
      "status": false,
      "mode": 1,
      "spacer": " | ",
      "emptyVolumeName": {
        "action": false,
        "replace": "第一卷：默认"
      },
      "onlyOneShow": false
    }
  }
  let variable = (book.getVariable("custom") != "" && book.getVariable("custom") != null) ? book.getVariable("custom") : source.getVariable();
  if(variable != "" && variable != null){
    try{
      variable = JSON.parse(variable);
    } catch(err) {
      java.log(err);
      variable = defaultVariable;
    }
  } else {
    variable = defaultVariable;
  }
  let data = JSON.parse(result).data;
  let list = data.chapterListWithVolume;
  let volume = data.volumeNameList;
  let chapters = [];
  let volume_names = [];
  for(let i in list){
    for(let x in list[i]){
      let c = list[i][x];
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 1 && volume_names.indexOf(c.volume_name) == -1){
        volume_names.push(c.volume_name);
        if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          chapters.push({
            title: ((c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace) ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name),
            isVolume: true
          });
        }
      }
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 2){
        if(c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace){
          c.title = (c.volume_name == "" ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name) + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        } else if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          c.title = c.volume_name + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        }
      }
      c.url  = source.bookSourceUrl +  `/content?item_id=${c.itemId}`;
      chapters.push(c);
    }
  }
  chapters
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
result = JSON.parse(result)
resultlength = result.length
for (var i=0; i<resultlength; resultlength--){
 let chapter = JSON.parse(java.ajax("https://api.kadokado.com.tw/v2/collection/withIsPurchased?publishedOnly=true&collectionId=" + result[resultlength - 1]["id"].match(/\d+/)[0]))
 Array.prototype.splice.apply(result, [resultlength, 0].concat(chapter))
 }
for (var i = 0; i < result.length; i++) {
  if (!isNaN(result[i].id)) {
  result[i].id = "https://api.kadokado.com.tw/v2/chapter/" + result[i].id
  } else {
  result[i].id = ""
  }
 if (result[i].hasOwnProperty('free')) {
 result[i].free = !result[i].free
 }
}
result = result
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: [property$=author]@content
ruleBookInfo.kind:
<js>
let tags=[];
try{tags=String(java.getElement('@@script')[0]).match(/.*[tags]+\: \'(.*?)\|\'.*/)[0].replace(/.*[tags]+\: \'(.*?)\|\'.*/,'$1').split('\|');}catch(error){let tag='';}
tags.push(String(java.getElement('@@class.booknav2.0@p.2').text()).match(/(连载|全本)/)[0]);
tags.push(String(java.getElement('@@class.booknav2.0@p.3').text()).replace('更新：',''));
tags.unshift(String(java.getElement('@@class.booknav2.0@p.1').text()).replace('分类：',''));
tags</js>
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
[property$=chapter_name]@content
##\d+\.|（.*|\(.*|【.*|(零|一|二|三|四|五|六|七|八|九|十|百|千|万)(.|\s)*章|“|”
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3
ruleBookInfo.name: [property$=book_name]@content

ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##.*作者：.*|\(本章完\)|PS：.*求推荐！|PS：.*求收藏！|感谢.*打赏.*|感谢.*推荐票.*|感谢.*月票.*|（.*月票.*）|（为大家的.*票加更.*）|第二更在.*|loadAdv.*

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let list=java.getElement('@@id.catalog@ul@li@a');
let result=[];
let stat=java.getElement('@@id.catalog.0@ul.0@li.0@data-num').text();
if(stat=="1"){
	result=list;}
	else{
		for(let i=list.length-1;i>=0;i--){
			result[result.length]=list[i];}}
	result
	</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
 var arr=title;
 var srt=title.replace(/ /g,"");
 var sft=title.replace(/第.*?章./g,"第.*?");
 var sfc=sft.replace(/$/g,".*?页");
 var sfn=sft.replace(/$/g,".*?继续阅读。");
 var srf=title.replace(/ /g,"　");
 var fdr=title.replace(/[0-9]+[\s|\u3000]/g,"");
 var dff=src.replace(new RegExp(arr,"g"),"");
 var dfc=dff.replace(new RegExp("\n.{1,7}"+fdr,"g"),"");
 result=dfc.replace(new RegExp(srf,"g"),"").replace(new RegExp(srt,"g"),"").replace(new RegExp(sfn,"g"),"").replace(new RegExp(sfc,"g"),"");
</js>
